extension.description: Autonomous coding agent right in your IDE, capable of creating/editing files, running commands, using the browser, and more with your permission every step of the way.
walkthrough.title: Meet Parrot, your new coding partner
walkthrough.description: Parrot codes like a developer because it thinks like one. Here are 5 ways to put it to work:
walkthrough.step1.title: Start with a Goal, Not Just a Prompt
walkthrough.step1.description: Tell Parrot what you want to achieve. It plans, asks, and then codes, like a true partner.
walkthrough.step2.title: Let Parrot Learn Your Codebase
walkthrough.step2.description: Point Parrot to your project. It builds understanding to make smart, context-aware changes.
walkthrough.step3.title: Always Use the Best AI Models
walkthrough.step3.description: Parrot empowers you with State-of-the-Art AI, connecting to top models (Anthropic, Gemini, OpenAI & more).
walkthrough.step4.title: Extend with Powerful Tools (MCP)
walkthrough.step4.description: Connect to databases, APIs, or discover new capabilities in the MCP Marketplace.
walkthrough.step5.title: You're Always in Control
walkthrough.step5.description: Review Parrot's plans and diffs. Approve changes before they happen. No surprises.
